strings:
<voice_0x010013F9><center>You are brave to have followed my shadow
<center>here from the World of Light.
<center>And you are able fighters.

<voice_0x010013FA><center>Perhaps you have realised already,
<center>but that battle was a test.

<voice_0x010013FB><center>Please forgive my methods,
<center>but I am in search of
<center>someone strong to help me...
<voice_0x010013FC><se_low>King Trode: What do you mean? Surely you don't expect us to help you attack the village?
<voice_0x010013FD><se_low>King Trode: I'm afraid you've misjudged us! We're not about to help you with your tyrannous scheme!

<voice_0x010013FE><center>Please do not misunderstand me.
<center>It was never my desire to attack the village.

<voice_0x010013FF><center>That too is part of the reason
<center>why I am in need of help.

<voice_0x01001400><center>When Rhapthorne, Lord of Darkness,
<center>attempted to conquer the World of Light,
<center>I helped the sages to seal him away.

<voice_0x01001401><center>In so doing, I earnt the enmity of
<center>the monstrous servants of Rhapthorne.
<center>That is why I am in this predicament.

<voice_0x01001402><center>I have a baby... An egg in my nest...
<center>I have been waiting for the day
<center>it would hatch.

<voice_0x01001403><center>But my nest has been captured by Gemon,
<center>one of Rhapthorne's foul minions.
<center>He is holding my egg hostage.

<voice_0x01001404><center>He forced me to attack the human village.
<center>I could not refuse if I wanted to save my child.

<voice_0x01001405><center>Normally, I would have nothing to fear
<center>from the likes of Gemon, but as long as he
<center>has my egg, I am powerless to oppose him.

<voice_0x01001406><center>That is why I must find someone
<center>to fight him in my place.
<center>Someone brave and strong.

<voice_0x01001407><center>You did not waver in following my shadow
<center>here to the World of Darkness.
<center>Such bravery is rare.

<voice_0x01001408><center>And now you have proven your strength
<center>in battle, I have no doubt that you are
<center>the only ones brave enough and
<center>strong enough to defeat Gemon!

<voice_0x01001409><center>Please help me. Save my egg!
<center>For me, for my unborn child,
<center>and for the people of this island.

<voice_0x0100140A><se_low>King Trode: Now listen, <hero>, my boy!
You cannot ignore the request of a lady...
I mean bird... I mean ladybird...
Oh, blast and botheration!
<voice_0x0100140B><se_low>King Trode: What I'm trying to say is that there's no excuse whatsoever for not helping someone in need!

<voice_0x0100140C><se_low>King Trode: Do not worry, Empyrea. These people serve me,
and I order them to rescue your egg!

<voice_0x0100140D><center>Thank you.
<center>I was right to choose you.

<voice_0x0100140E><center>My nest is on a precipice
<center>at the summit of a mountain
<center>far beyond the reach of humans.

<voice_0x0100140F><center>Gemon will be watching for me,
<center>so I cannot take you all the way to the top.
<center>But I can take you to the mountain's base.
<voice_0x01001410><center>Are you ready to go now?

<voice_0x01001411><center>Very well.
<center>I will be waiting for you here.
<center>Just tell me when you are ready.

<voice_0x01001412><center>I will take you.
<center>All of you, climb into the wagon
<center>or hold on tight.

<voice_0x01001413><center>Away we go.
<center>Be sure to hold on tight.

<voice_0x01001414><center>I see that you are now ready.
<center>Shall we go?

<voice_0x01001415><center>Shall I take you to the foot of
<center>the mountain where my nest lies?
<voice_0x01001416><center>Then let us depart.

<voice_0x0100141B><center>If you were able to come here,
<center>that means the door to the
<center>World of Light is still open.

<voice_0x0100141C><center>I lost the power to return to my world
<center>long ago, in battle with the Lord of Darkness.
<center>But now I can feel it slowly returning.

<voice_0x0100141D><center>Perhaps the time is coming
<center>when I will need it again.

<voice_0x0100141E><center>...But, I imagine that you must have some
<center>reason for coming all this way to visit me.

<voice_0x0100141F><center>Do you wish to return to the mountain
<center>on which I built my nest?

<voice_0x01001420><center>I can take you to the bottom if you wish.
<center>Just climb into the wagon or hold on tight.

<voice_0x01001421><center>No? You don't want me to take you there?
<center>I'm afraid that's all I can do for you at present...

<voice_0x01001422><center>If my old powers were to return,
<center>I'm sure I could help you.
<center>I'm sorry that I cannot be of any use.

<voice_0x01001423><center>What is it? Have you decided to
<center>go back to the nest after all?

<voice_0x01001420><center>I can take you to the bottom if you wish.
<center>Just climb into the wagon or hold on tight.
